process.name: Scrum - Carnival
process.description: Rollout common Bug template to Scrum-Default projects

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning this bug

fields.name: Remaining Work
fields.description: An estimate of the number of units of work remaining to complete this bug

fields.name: Activity
fields.description: Type of work involved

fields.name: Value Area
fields.description: The type should be set to Business primarily to represent customer-facing issues. Work to change the architecture should be added as a Product Backlog Item

fields.name: Target Date
fields.description: The target date for completing the epic

fields.name: Business Value
fields.description: The business value for the customer when the epic is released

fields.name: Time Criticality
fields.description: How does the business value decay over time. Higher values make the epic more time critical

fields.name: Application Type
fields.description: The type of application on which to give feedback

fields.name: Application Start Information
fields.description: The path to execute the application

fields.name: Application Launch Instructions
fields.description: Instructions to launch the specified application

fields.name: Rating
fields.description: Overall rating provided as part of feedback response

fields.name: Test Suite Type
fields.description: Specifies the category of the test suite.

fields.name: Test Suite Audit
fields.description: Captures the test suite audit trail.

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning this bug

fields.name: Remaining Work
fields.description: An estimate of the number of units of work remaining to complete this bug

fields.name: Activity
fields.description: Type of work involved

fields.name: Value Area
fields.description: The type should be set to Business primarily to represent customer-facing issues. Work to change the architecture should be added as a Product Backlog Item

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning this task

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: Importance to business

fields.name: Remaining Work
fields.description: An estimate of the number of units of work remaining to complete this task

fields.name: Activity
fields.description: Type of work involved

fields.name: Title
fields.description: What the user will be able to do when this is implemented

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description or acceptance criteria for this epic to be considered complete

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning the epic

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this epic is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this epic will be implemented

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the epic is in its current state

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: Priority for completing the epic, based on business goals

fields.name: Target Date
fields.description: The target date for completing the epic

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The date to start the task

fields.name: Business Value
fields.description: The business value for the customer when the epic is released

fields.name: Time Criticality
fields.description: How does the business value decay over time. Higher values make the epic more time critical

fields.name: Effort
fields.description: The estimated effort to implemented the epic

fields.name: Value Area
fields.description: Business = Customer-facing epics; Architectural = Technology initiatives to support current and future business needs

fields.name: Integration Build
fields.description: The build in which the epic was fixed

fields.name: Title
fields.description: What the user will be able to do when this is implemented

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description or acceptance criteria for this feature to be considered complete

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning the feature

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this feature is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this feature will be implemented

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the feature is in its current state

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: Priority for completing the feature, based on business goals

fields.name: Target Date
fields.description: The target date for completing the feature

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The date to start the task

fields.name: Business Value
fields.description: The business value for the customer when the feature is released

fields.name: Time Criticality
fields.description: How does the business value decay over time. Higher values make the feature more time critical

fields.name: Effort
fields.description: The estimated effort to implemented the feature

fields.name: Value Area
fields.description: Business = Services provided by the system to fulfill stakeholder needs; Architectural = Technical system services to implement business features that deliver solution value

fields.name: Integration Build
fields.description: The build in which the feature was fixed

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning this backlog item

fields.name: Business Value
fields.description: The business value for the customer when the backlog item is released

fields.name: Effort
fields.description: The estimated effort to implemented the backlog item

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: Priority for completing the backlog item, based on business goals

fields.name: Value Area
fields.description: Business = delivers value to a user or another system; Architectural = work to support other stories or components

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this test plan will execute.

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product associated with this test plan.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the test plan.

fields.name: State
fields.description: Workflow status.  Active = tests in this test plan must be run; Inactive = tests in this test plan no longer need to be run

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: Reason for the current test plan state.

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning this test plan.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Purpose of this test plan

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The start date to run the tests in this test plan.

fields.name: Finish Date
fields.description: The completion date for running all the tests in this test plan.

fields.name: Integration Build
fields.description: The build on which the test plan was executed

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration for this test suite.

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product associated with this test suite.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the test suite.

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the test suite.

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why  the current test suite is in the current state.

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently assigned to the test suite.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Purpose of this test suite

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: Integration Build
fields.description: The build on which the test suite was executed

fields.name: Test Suite Type
fields.description: Specifies the category of the test suite.

fields.name: Test Suite Audit
fields.description: Captures the test suite audit trail.

workItemTypes.name: Bug
workItemTypes.description: Describes a divergence between required and actual behavior, and tracks the work done to correct the defect and verify the correction.

workItemTypes.name: Task
workItemTypes.description: Tracks work that needs to be done.

workItemTypes.name: Epic
workItemTypes.description: Epics help teams effectively manage and groom their product backlog

workItemTypes.name: Feature
workItemTypes.description: Tracks a feature that will be released with the product

workItemTypes.name: Product Backlog Item
workItemTypes.description: Tracks an activity the user will be able to perform with the product.

workItemTypes.name: Test Case
workItemTypes.description: Server-side data for a set of steps to be tested.

workItemTypes.name: Test Plan
workItemTypes.description: Tracks test activities for a specific milestone or release.

workItemTypes.name: Test Suite
workItemTypes.description: Tracks test activites for a specific feature, requirement, or user story.
